system.effect: The target's head bursts like an overripe fruit and sprays blood, bone, and brains in all directions. Each target within 4 metres of the deceased must make a Challenging (+0) Agility test or suffer a -10 penalty to his Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill tests on his next turn, as gore gets in his eyes or obscures his visor. The attack was so powerful that it passes through the target and strikes another target nearby. If the hit was from a melee weapon, the attacker may immediately make another attack (with the same weapon) against any other target he can reach without moving. If the hit was from a ranged weapon, he may immediately make another attack (with the same weapon) against any target standing directly behind the original target and within range of his weapon.
